scripts.build:mytwinlife: node scripts/publicAssets.js twinme && npm run build -- --mode mytwinlife --outDir mytwinlife-webapp-ui
scripts.build:twinme: node scripts/publicAssets.js twinme && npm run build -- --mode twinme --outDir twinme-webapp-ui
scripts.build:skred: node scripts/publicAssets.js skred && npm run build -- --mode skred --outDir skred-webapp-ui
scripts.build:mytwinlife:transfer: node scripts/publicAssets.js twinme && npm run build -- --mode mytwinlife-transfer --outDir mytwinlife-webapp-transfer
scripts.build:twinme:transfer: node scripts/publicAssets.js twinme && npm run build -- --mode twinme-transfer --outDir twinme-webapp-transfer
scripts.build:skred:transfer: node scripts/publicAssets.js skred && npm run build -- --mode skred-transfer --outDir skred-webapp-transfer
